mapper.select: SELECT a.doctor_feedback_request_no as doctorFeedbackRequestNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.doctor_no as doctorNo ,a.disease_no as diseaseNo ,b.disease_name as diseaseName ,a.doctor_feedback_request_title as doctorFeedbackRequestTitle ,a.doctor_feedback_request_content as doctorFeedbackRequestContent ,a.doctor_feedback_request_date as doctorFeedbackRequestDate FROM doctor_feedback_request a, disease b WHERE doctor_feedback_request_no = #{doctorFeedbackRequestNo} AND a.disease_no = b.disease_no

SELECT doctor_feedback_result_no as doctorFeedbackResultNo ,doctor_feedback_result_title as doctorFeedbackResultTitle ,doctor_feedback_result_content as doctorFeedbackResultContent ,doctor_feedback_result_date as doctorFeedbackResultDate FROM doctor_feedback_result
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM doctor_feedback_approval WHERE doctor_feedback_request_no = #{doctorFeedbackRequestNo}

SELECT a.my_disease_detail_no as myDiseaseDetailNo ,a.disease_sub_category_no as diseaseSubCategory ,d.disease_no as diseaseNo ,c.family_history as familyHistory ,c.disease_sub_category_name as diseaseSubCategoryName ,d.disease_name as diseaseName FROM my_disease_detail a, my_disease b, disease_sub_category c, disease d WHERE a.my_disease_no=b.my_disease_no and a.disease_sub_category_no=c.disease_sub_category_no and c.disease_no = d.disease_no and b.member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT a.doctor_feedback_request_no as doctorFeedbackRequestNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.doctor_no as doctorNo ,a.disease_no as diseaseNo ,b.disease_name as diseaseName ,a.doctor_feedback_request_title as doctorFeedbackRequestTitle ,a.doctor_feedback_request_content as doctorFeedbackRequestContent ,a.doctor_feedback_request_date as doctorFeedbackRequestDate FROM doctor_feedback_request a, disease b WHERE doctor_feedback_request_no = #{doctorFeedbackRequestNo} AND a.disease_no = b.disease_no

SELECT doctor_feedback_request_no as doctorFeedbackRequestNo ,member_no as memberNo ,doctor_no as doctorNo ,disease_no as diseaseNo ,doctor_feedback_request_title as doctorFeedbackRequestTitle ,doctor_feedback_request_content as doctorFeedbackRequestContent ,doctor_feedback_request_date as doctorFeedbackRequestDate FROM doctor_feedback_request WHERE doctor_no = #{dotorNo}
SELECT disease_no as diseaseNo ,disease_name as diseaseName FROM disease

SELECT doctor_feedback_request_no as doctorFeedbackRequestNo ,member_no as memberNo ,doctor_no as doctorNo ,disease_no as diseaseNo ,doctor_feedback_request_title as doctorFeedbackRequestTitle ,doctor_feedback_request_content as doctorFeedbackRequestContent ,doctor_feedback_request_date as doctorFeedbackRequestDate FROM doctor_feedback_request WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT a.member_no as memberNo ,b.member_name as memberName ,a.member_hospital_name as memberHospitalName ,a.treatment_department as treatment_department ,a.member_total_feedback as memberTotalFeedback ,a.member_agree_feedback as memberAgreeFeedback ,a.member_join_approval as memberJoinApproval ,a.evaluation_average_grade as evaluationAverageGrade ,a.feedback_availablilty as feedbackAvailablilty ,a.member_approval_date as memberApprovalDate FROM member_doctor a, member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no AND member_join_approval = 'T' AND feedback_availablilty = 'T'
